# pingone_password_policies (Data Source)

Data source to retrieve all password policies.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pingone_password_policies" "example" {
  environment_id = var.environment_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The ID of the environment to read password policies from. Must be a valid PingOne resource ID.  Must be a valid PingOne resource ID.  This field is immutable and will trigger a replace plan if changed.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `ids` (Set of String) The list of resulting IDs of password policies that have been successfully retrieved.
